question: Naman Tanwar won ___________ medal in the men's 91 kg category at the 2018 Commonwealth Games.
explanation: Nineteen-year-old Naman Tanwar won India its first boxing medal at the 2018 Commonwealth Games, winning a bronze in the men's 91 kg category. Naman lost out to Australia's Jason Whateley in the semifinal of the event to secure the bronze.
